text: The Houston Chronicle is the largest daily newspaper in Texas, USA. As of March 2007, it is the ninth largest newspaper circulating in the United States. With the demise of its long-time rival the Houston Post, its nearest major competitors are located in Dallas-Fort Worth. ==Other websites== ===Official sites=== * The Houston Chronicle ===Links critical of the Chronicle=== * Chronically Biased - Archives of a (no-longer published) anti- Chronicle weblog * Lone Star Times - blog launched by Dan Patrick * Texas Media Watch - media watchdog group (archived) * blogHOUSTON - Houston media and politics weblog ===Miscellaneous=== * Hearst subsidiary profile of the Houston Chronicle Category:Newspapers in the United States Category:Houston
title: Houston Chronicle
